titleStmt.title: The Church of England a true church: proved in a disputation held by John Bastwick Doctor in Physick, against Mr. Walter Montague in the Tower. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Bastwick, John, 1593-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. Crooke and I. Rothwell, and are to be sold at their shops in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
